title: Human Factors Integration Plans
content: A Human Factors Integration Plan (HFIP) ensures HF considerations are built into every phase of a drilling rig projectâ€”from design through commissioning. The earlier HF is integrated, the more cost-effective and safer the final system. Without an HFIP, human performance issues surface late when fixes are expensive or impractical.
openQuestions: Does your organization have a formal HFIP for new builds or major modifications?
What HF issues could have been prevented if addressed during design rather than operations?
